name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Network Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in ensuring secure and efficient network infrastructure utilizing skills in **AWS**, **Azure**, **TCP/IP**, and **Cloud Computing**. My expertise lies in implementing and maintaining robust security protocols using technologies like **Palo Alto**, **Fortinet**, and **Cisco**, along with advanced routing protocols including **BGP** and **ISD/IPS**. I have a proven track record in documenting network configurations and performing thorough troubleshooting to optimize performance and security.
In my previous roles, I have effectively managed client relationships and facilitated knowledge transfer processes, ensuring smooth communication and seamless project execution. Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in designing scalable architectures, leveraging powerful cloud services, and employing industry certifications such as **CompTIA Security+** and **CCNP** to enhance system resilience and compliance.
